snippet.title: Virtua Sonic - RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
Virtua Sonic is finally released for all SteamVR-enabled VR devices! 
I won't waste your time here in the description. Head to the SAGE Expo page for the download link, screenshots and more information:

http://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/virtua-sonic.685/

Have a great SAGE, everyone! Here's to 20 years!
